name: Hive Bees
description: Hive bees, like the vanilla bee, lives in hives and produce honey and resources. They have to live in $(l:hives/advanced_hives)advanced hives$(/l) to produce resource combs. Most hive bees are bred from solitary bees and other hive bees but some are made by giving a specific item to a bee or by crafting spawn eggs. All bee recipes and flower requirements can be found in JEI.
